titles.title: Energy Markets Anti-Manipulation and Integrity Restoration Act
To amend the Commodity Exchange Act to provide for regulation of energy derivatives, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1305)
Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

bill.summary:
6/20/2008--Introduced.
Energy Markets Anti-Manipulation and Integrity Restoration Act - Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to give the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) jurisdiction over energy derivatives traded on or through a board of trade, exchange, or market, either domestic or foreign.
